full_text: Utterly brazen of @BorisJohnson to claim in PMQs that the shortages of Personal Protective Equipment are “enraging” The truth is that shortages of PPE are entirely the responsibility of himself and his government #Covid19UK https://t.co/QCyq38jUR2

full_text: As he takes part in the VE Day celebrations, and pays tribute to that generation, I hope @BorisJohnson reflects on how his words, actions and inactions have contributed to many of them dying, and that it produces a little humility when he speaks to the people of Britain on Sunday
